title-group.article-title: An Algorithm for Assembly Centric Design

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2003 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: This paper describes and demonstrates the use of an assembly centric design algorithm as an aid to achieving minimal hard tooling assembly concepts. The algorithm consists of a number of logically ordered design methodologies and also aids the identification of other enabling technologies. Included in the methodologies is an innovative systems analysis tool that enables the comparison of alternative assembly concepts, and the prediction and control of the total assembly error, at the outline stage of the design.
